Package Controller

Class Login

java.lang.Object
Controller.Login
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Login extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The `Login` class controls the user authentication process. It handles user login attempts and logs activity.

    • handleLogin

      public void handleLogin(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      Handles the login action when the login button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The ActionEvent triggered by the user.
      Throws:

      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs.

    • logLoginActivity

      private void logLoginActivity(String username, boolean success)
      Logs the login activity.
      Parameters:
      username - The username used for login.
      success - True if the login attempt was successful, otherwise false.
